channel.title: Help with handlers
channel.description:
Say I wanted to make a handler, in my server folder there would be a folder called quests, then my handler would be called "quest1.java"
what would i pu in my server.java and wherever else i need to change something.
also, how would i start the handler file?

item.title: Help with handlers
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

i dont need to add like \quests or anything?

Read full topic

item.title: Help with handlers
item.dc:creator: @BurnInSilence BurnInSilence
item.description:
@BurnInSilence wrote:

alright lets say you got PlayerHandler.java
ssearch in server.java for anything that says PlayerHandler and do what it does

Read full topic
